title: Eth CLassic Node keeps dropping peer
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `3.5.0`
OS & Version: Windows 10
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour
Loading node ready for mining

#### Actual behaviour
Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.10586]
(c) 2015 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

C:\>cd/etc

C:\ETC>geth.exe

cd/
cd/ETC
geth.exe

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````
Sorry. We do not support the `ETC` chain. Please open an issue at their repo.
